org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.service

Class DefaultPrivilegeManagerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.entitlement.service.DefaultPrivilegeManagerFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrivilegeManagerFactory

    public final class DefaultPrivilegeManagerFactory
extends Object
implements PrivilegeManagerFactory
    Basic default privilege manager factory which leverages the existing PrivilegeManager.getInstance(String, Subject) method.
    Since:
    13.0.0

        public PrivilegeManager get(String realm,
                            Subject subject)
        Description copied from interface: PrivilegeManagerFactory
        Gets a privilege manager for the given realm and admin subject.
        Specified by:
        get in interface PrivilegeManagerFactory
        Parameters:
        realm - the realm to manage privileges for.
        subject - the subject to use to perform management actions.
